Modular Query Refinement

Modular Query Refinement

Built AI model to expand the query input by the user using Latent Dirichlet Algorithm (LDA) and coherence techniques. Experimenting with different algorithms for preprocessing and training with multiple models implementing LDA, LSA, keybert, etc for better results.

Medical Chatbot

Medical Chatbot

Built flexible and efficient frontend integrated with Django backend. Fine-tuned sentence transformer and BERT-base transformer to train model on medical data present in SQUAD format.

Pneumonia Detection Website

Pneumonia Detection Website

Built a pneumonia detection web app with Django backend and ML model integration. Enabled real-time X-ray image upload, analysis, and result display with computer vision capabilities.

Sikshya - Voice to Text Summarizer

Sikshya - Voice to Text Summarizer
